changelog:
Alpha 1 - Enhanced UI & Smarter Resource Management

   This alpha improves resource management with automatic folder organization, refreshes UI visuals with a Material3 Expressive theme, and refines keyboard and compatibility behavior for a more reliable development experience.

⦁ Added:
 ▫ App now automatically creates subfolders (Components, Local Libs) when the user selects a SAF storage path.

⦁ Updated:
 ▫ App icon refreshed with higher-quality graphics for a sharper and more polished appearance.
 ▫ Privacy Policy and Terms of Service updated for transparency and compliance.

⦁ Improved:
 ▫ Resource saving is now smarter — component files are stored in the Components folder, while local library files are stored in the Local Libs folder for better organization.
 ▫ Improved UI behavior when using physical keyboards to ensure consistent navigation and visual feedback.
 ▫ App theme updated to Material3 Expressive for a more modern and dynamic interface.

⦁ Fixed:
 ▫ User feedback email corrected to ensure messages reach the proper support channel.
 ▫ Fixed duplicate message display in the previous app update dialog.
 ▫ Fixed Code Display icon in Settings page — previously showed the Settings icon; now displays the correct Code Display icon.

⦁ Removed:
 ▫ On devices running Android 5.1 and below, the app will now automatically exit after the Splash screen.
 ▫ Fast scroller FAB drag elevation removed for a cleaner interaction experience.
